text: Trailer Tuesday gets animals interested in volleyball, messes with puzzling doors, and starts fights with skeletons while racing go karts. PICO PARK 2 “PICO PARK 2 is a 2D action-puzzle game where working together is key!” PICO PARK 2 is available now on the Nintendo eShop, Microsoft Store, and Steam. Misao – 2024 HD Remaster “Explore a school plagued by unnatural phenomena in this horror-adventure game revolving around the missing girl Misao.” Misao – 2024 HD Remaster is available now on Steam. Forgive Me Father 2 “Embark on a journey into the darkest nightmares to restore your sanity. Blast your way through hordes of possessed enemies, unlock an arsenal of deadly weapons and unearthly abilities, and get ready to face even more Lovecraftian madness in this action-packed FPS sequel.” Forgive Me Father 2 is available now on Steam. Immortal Hunters “Defy fate, expose the lies of the Cardinals, and find a reborn God before the Khemrids destroy humanity.” Immortal Hunters is available now on Steam Early Access. Back Then “Back Then is a first-person narrative game taking place in the mind of Thomas Eilian, an elderly writer diagnosed with Alzheimer’s Disease.” Back Then is available now on the PlayStation Store, GOG, Epic Games Store, and Steam. Death of the Reprobate “Explore a world built from the luscious landscapes, turbulent townscapes and preposterous portraits of real Renaissance paintings.” Death of the Reprobate is available now on Steam. Doors: Paradox “Make your way through a variety of hand-crafted 3D dioramas, look for useful objects, find hidden clues and solve fun puzzles! Unravel this mysterious adventure about chaos, order and the surreal.” Doors: Paradox is available now on the Nintendo eShop, Microsoft Store, App Store, Google Play, the Epic Games Store, and Steam. Beastieball “A turn-based volleyball RPG where you coach a sports team of Beasties!” Beastieball is available now on Steam Early Access. Ritual Night “Summon Cthulhu in this social deduction game with no early eliminations! Monsters work together to complete the ritual, while stealthy humans secretly sabotage and cause chaos.” Ritual Night is available now on Steam Early Access. Carnage Kart X “Use your weapons and driving skill to survive swarms of fiendish ghouls and horrendous horrors who would like nothing more than to see you join the ranks of the dead!” Carnage Kart X is available now on Steam Early Access. About The Author Joel Couture Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.

Trailer Tuesday gets animals interested in volleyball, messes with puzzling doors, and starts fights with skeletons while racing go karts.

PICO PARK 2

“PICO PARK 2 is a 2D action-puzzle game where working together is key!”

PICO PARK 2 is available now on the Nintendo eShop, Microsoft Store, and Steam.

Misao – 2024 HD Remaster

“Explore a school plagued by unnatural phenomena in this horror-adventure game revolving around the missing girl Misao.”

Misao – 2024 HD Remaster is available now on Steam.

Forgive Me Father 2

“Embark on a journey into the darkest nightmares to restore your sanity. Blast your way through hordes of possessed enemies, unlock an arsenal of deadly weapons and unearthly abilities, and get ready to face even more Lovecraftian madness in this action-packed FPS sequel.”

Forgive Me Father 2 is available now on Steam.

Immortal Hunters

“Defy fate, expose the lies of the Cardinals, and find a reborn God before the Khemrids destroy humanity.”

Immortal Hunters is available now on Steam Early Access.

Back Then

“Back Then is a first-person narrative game taking place in the mind of Thomas Eilian, an elderly writer diagnosed with Alzheimer’s Disease.”

Back Then is available now on the PlayStation Store, GOG, Epic Games Store, and Steam.

Death of the Reprobate

“Explore a world built from the luscious landscapes, turbulent townscapes and preposterous portraits of real Renaissance paintings.”

Death of the Reprobate is available now on Steam.

Doors: Paradox

“Make your way through a variety of hand-crafted 3D dioramas, look for useful objects, find hidden clues and solve fun puzzles! Unravel this mysterious adventure about chaos, order and the surreal.”

Doors: Paradox is available now on the Nintendo eShop, Microsoft Store, App Store, Google Play, the Epic Games Store, and Steam.

Beastieball

“A turn-based volleyball RPG where you coach a sports team of Beasties!”

Beastieball is available now on Steam Early Access.

Ritual Night

“Summon Cthulhu in this social deduction game with no early eliminations! Monsters work together to complete the ritual, while stealthy humans secretly sabotage and cause chaos.”

Ritual Night is available now on Steam Early Access.

Carnage Kart X

“Use your weapons and driving skill to survive swarms of fiendish ghouls and horrendous horrors who would like nothing more than to see you join the ranks of the dead!”

Carnage Kart X is available now on Steam Early Access.

About The Author

Joel Couture

Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
